heading: HR00954
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRARIAN REFORM TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE MISCONDUCT AND CONTEMPT BY THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE REGION XI OFFICE (PRO XI) DUE TO ITS FAILURE TO PROVIDE POLICE ASSISTANCE ON THE APRIL 18, 2017 - EXECUTION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRARIAN REFORM'S (DAR) WRIT OF INSTALLATION OF 159 AGRARIAN REFORM BENEFICIARIES BELONGING TO THE MADAUM AGRARIAN REFORM BENEFICIARIES ASSOCIATION, INC. (MARBAI) ON THE 145-HECTARES LAND IN BRGY. SAN ISIDRO, TAGUM CITY, DAVAO DEL NORTE, WHICH WAS STRONGLY OPPOSED BY THE LORENZO-OWNED LAPANDAY FOODS CORP. WHICH DEPLOYED ABOUT 800 ARMED GUARDS AT THE DISPUTED LANDS
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2017-05-16
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00954
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRARIAN REFORM TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE MISCONDUCT AND CONTEMPT BY THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE REGION XI OFFICE (PRO XI) DUE TO ITS FAILURE TO PROVIDE POLICE ASSISTANCE ON THE APRIL 18, 2017 - EXECUTION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRARIAN REFORM'S (DAR) WRIT OF INSTALLATION OF 159 AGRARIAN REFORM BENEFICIARIES BELONGING TO THE MADAUM AGRARIAN REFORM BENEFICIARIES ASSOCIATION, INC. (MARBAI) ON THE 145-HECTARES LAND IN BRGY. SAN ISIDRO, TAGUM CITY, DAVAO DEL NORTE, WHICH WAS STRONGLY OPPOSED BY THE LORENZO-OWNED LAPANDAY FOODS CORP. WHICH DEPLOYED ABOUT 800 ARMED GUARDS AT THE DISPUTED LANDS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., DE JESUS, EMMI A., TINIO, ANTONIO L., BROSAS, ARLENE D., CASTRO, FRANCE L., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-02
